title: What is this Serif font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110027im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-08-22%20at%204_4242.35.58%20PM.png)

Can anyone help me identify what typeface was used? Is the 3 a different font from 'Click'.

Thanks!

Font: 

 HTF Schneidler 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110027/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: LProvidence

comments.content:
"3" must be **[TF Habitat Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110027/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/050806_TFHabitat_2c5a.html)** by Joseph Treacy (Treacy Faces, 1986-92)

the rest of text looks like **[Schneidler HTF Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110027/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones&ffam=Schneidler%20HTF-Titling%20-%20Regular&fid=0dd3cc326ad4d22075bf2a9ec789aedf&fsize=60&text=CLICK%203%20X&fit=1)** by Hoefler & Frere Jones (1991)
